Arraignment as to Jaime Torres-Laboy (3) Count 1,2,3 held on 10/1/2009. Defendant waived the reading of the Indictment and entered a PONG as to all counts. Defense counsel stated that he did not have any information to rebut the presumption, but requested additional time to conduct investigation and reserved the right to reopen hearing.
